General.Name: TC Traders Club Ltda
General.Description: TC Traders Club S.A. operates an investor community. The company's platform offers market intelligence generated by networking among thousands of investors, which share their investment ideas and exchange experiences, and by providing information related to the Brazilian financial market. It also offers financial education and data analysis , as well as provides several courses for those who invest or would like to start investing. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Leopoldo Couto de Magalhães Júnior, nº 758, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04542-100
